response.explain: The previous action code has successfully moved the robot to the box of chocolates without any execution error. Now, the robot needs to grasp the box of chocolates.
response.subtask:
(1) Register the box of chocolates and the carton.
(2) Move the robot to the carton.
(3) Open the carton.
(4) Move the robot to the box of chocolates.
(5) Grasp the box of chocolates.
(6) Move the robot to the carton.
(7) Put the box of chocolates inside the carton.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 5: Grasp the box of chocolates
    box_of_chocolates_197 = registry(env,"box_of_chocolates_197")
    EasyGrasp(robot, box_of_chocolates_197)
    donothing(env)
